subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2022)
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A November-December World Cup could cause potentially major financial hits for professional leagues and competitions in Europe, Australia and elsewhere, but it is good news for the Olympics, Wimbledon, audiences in Asia and marketers.
snippet: A November-December World Cup could cause potentially major financial hits for professional leagues and competitions in Europe, Australia and elsewhere, but it is good news for the Olympics, Wimbledon, audiences in Asia and marketers.
